properties.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Kern County Desert
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 8 at 6:44PM PST until January 9 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Hanford CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Sustained west to northwest winds 20 to 30 mph, with
gusts near 50 mph.

* WHERE...Indian Wells Valley and Kern County Desert.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM PST Thursday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong wind gusts may blow down tree limbs. A few
power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult,
particularly for high profile vehicles.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not
limited to Highway 14, Highway 178 below Walker Pass, and
Highway 58 below Tehachapi Pass, including the town of Mojave.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THURSDAY MORNING
